task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `FullName@bank`
- Your bank account: `AccountNumber@bank`, with PIN `PIN@bank`
- Today is `Day@schedule` the `Date@plane` of June, `Time@restaurant`

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Checking bank balance
- Filing a bank fraud report
- Reserving a table at a restaurant (e.g. `Name-1@restaurant` or `Name-2@restaurant`) for today
- A game of trivia
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'Reserving a table at a restaurant', 'Bank balance checking' and 'Filing a bank fraud report' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also play up to three rounds of trivia with the assistant.
You may attempt to do some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at any time.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want', or 'anything but ...', etc.)
If you like, you can ask for a game of trivia at any point. But don't play more than three rounds.
Keep going :) - don't forget some smalltalk. Perhaps say something related to the first topic you talked about.

Keep going until you've covered all the topics (reserving a table at a restaurant, bank balance checking, and bank fraud report). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.
Almost there. A few more turns.
Ok, once you've touched on all the topics (restaurant, bank balance checking, and bank fraud report) and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
